member.summary: Makes a HTTP request asynchronously. Set callback to get response.

Content to be sent in request body. Only for POST and PUT methods.
Callback for response. Always check for the exception first then use the response stream.
Value for "Accept" in HTTP request header, e.g. "image/png,application/json"

member.summary: Gets the total number of available requests per API call for a specific method. Value applies to the last called method.

member.name: P:Esponce.QRCode.QRCodeClientBase.RateLimitReset
member.summary: Gets duration when the rate limit counter will reset. Value in milliseconds and applies to the last called method.

member.name: T:Esponce.QRCode.Content.BizcardContentFormat
member.summary: Builder and parser for BIZCARD format - a de-facto standard for QR Code business cards.
member.remarks: Sample: BIZCARD:N:Monkey;X:Esponce;T:Code Monkey;C:Esponce;A:432 Sherwood Circle, Lake Charles, LA 70601;B:+15551234560;E:monkey@esponce.com;;

member.name: P:Esponce.QRCode.Content.IContactContentFormat.DisplayName
member.summary: When implemented gets a name to display to users, usually first name, last name, or alias.

member.name: P:Esponce.QRCode.Content.IContactContentFormat.PhoneNumber
member.summary: When implemented gets or sets phone number.

member.name: P:Esponce.QRCode.Content.IContactContentFormat.EmailAddress
member.summary: When implemented gets or sets e-mail address.

member.name: P:Esponce.QRCode.Content.IContactContentFormat.WebsiteUrl
member.summary: When implemented gets or sets website URL.

member.name: P:Esponce.QRCode.Content.IContactContentFormat.FullAddress
member.summary: When implemented gets or sets address.

member.name: P:Esponce.QRCode.Content.BizcardContentFormat.WebsiteUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets website URL. Note that this field is not used by BIZCARD but is required by IContactContentFormat.

member.name: T:Esponce.QRCode.Content.MecardContentFormat
member.summary: Builder and parser for MECARD format (aka "Phonebook registration" from the specification)
member.remarks:
Sample: MECARD:N:Monkey,Esponce;ADR:432 Sherwood Circle,,Lake Charles,LA 70601;TEL:+15551234560;EMAIL:monkey@esponce.com;;
Specification: http://www.nttdocomo.co.jp/english/service/developer/make/content/barcode/function/application/addressbook/index.html http://www.nttdocomo.co.jp/english/service/developer/make/content/barcode/function/application/common/index.html

member.name: P:Esponce.QRCode.Content.MecardContentFormat.FriendlyName
member.summary: Gets a friendly contact name.

member.name: P:Esponce.QRCode.Content.MecardContentFormat.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets a name: last name and optional first name.

member.name: P:Esponce.QRCode.Content.MecardContentFormat.PhoneNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets primary phone number. Can contain characters #,*,0-9

member.name: P:Esponce.QRCode.Content.MecardContentFormat.VideoPhoneNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets videophone number. Can contain characters #,*,0-9

member.name: P:Esponce.QRCode.Content.MecardContentFormat.EmailAddress
member.summary: Gets or sets primary e-mail address.

member.name: T:Esponce.QRCode.Content.VCardContentFormat
member.summary: Parses and builds a VCARD format.
member.remarks:
References: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/VCard http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4770
BEGIN:VCARD VERSION:2.1 N:Esponce;Monkey FN:Monkey Esponce ... END:VCARD

member.name: M:Esponce.Common.ColorExtensions.ToHexString(System.Windows.Media.Color,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a hex string that represents a color, e.g. "#fff500" for yellow.
member.param: Append alpha channel ordered as ARGB.

member.name: M:Esponce.QRCode.Content.ContentFormatHelper.GetInlineTagName(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets an inline format name, e.g. "MECARD:N:John;;" -> "MECARD". Suitable for MECARD, WIFI and other inline formats.
member.param: Raw content to extract format name from.
A value indicating whether to convert tag name letters to upper case.
member.returns: Returns a tag name or null if tag name cannot be found.

member.name: M:Esponce.QRCode.Content.ContentFormatHelper.GetBlockTagName(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a block format name, e.g. "BEGIN:VCARD" -> "VCARD". Suitable for VCARD, VCALENDAR and other formats with BEGIN: and END: and new lines as separator.
member.param: Raw content to extract format name from.
A value indicating whether to convert tag name letters to upper case.
member.returns: Returns a tag name or null if tag name cannot be found.

member.name: M:Esponce.QRCode.Content.ContentFormatHelper.ParseInline(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Parses inline content, collects tag name and key-value pairs. Suitable for MECARD, WIFI and other inline formats.

member.name: M:Esponce.QRCode.Content.ContentFormatHelper.BuildInline(Esponce.QRCode.Content.ContentFormatDictionary,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Builds inline content from tag name and key-value pairs.

member.name: M:Esponce.QRCode.Content.ContentFormatHelper.EncodeNewLine(System.String)
member.summary: Encodes new line characters to "=0D=0A" (0x0D = '\r', 0x0A = '\n')

member.name: M:Esponce.QRCode.Content.ContentFormatHelper.DecodeNewLine(System.String)
member.summary: Decodes new line characters to "\r\n" (0x0D = '\r', 0x0A = '\n')

member.name: M:Esponce.QRCode.Content.ContentFormatHelper.Escape(System.String)
member.summary: Add special characters to escape sequence notation, e.g. ":" goes to "¥:"
member.remarks: See note in Common Items documentation http://www.nttdocomo.co.jp/english/service/developer/make/content/barcode/function/application/common/index.html

member.name: M:Esponce.QRCode.Content.ContentFormatHelper.Unescape(System.String)
member.summary: Removes escape sequence notation, e.g. "¥:" goes to ":" in "URL:http¥://i.nttdocomo.co.jp/;"
member.remarks: See note in Common Items documentation http://www.nttdocomo.co.jp/english/service/developer/make/content/barcode/function/application/common/index.html

member.name: M:Esponce.QRCode.QRCodeHelper.GetQRCodeMatrix(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a matrix of QR Code modules where "true" means black module and "false" means white module.
member.param: QR Code in ASCII format where 'x' stands for black module, ' ' for white module and optionally '.' for padding.
A value indicating whether padding modules should also be included in output.
member.returns: Returns matrix of black and white modules.

member.summary: Gets mime type by format.
